description:
Season: 18
Original Air Date: 9/06/2005

Brooke reveals to Eric that she’s going to keep her love for Nick a secret from Bridget. Later, Dante confronts Brooke about her feelings for Nick and he defends Bridget’s choice to lie about the abortion. Brooke asks Dante to spend the day with her. Meanwhile, Bridget admits to Eric that she is bothered when Brooke and Nick spend time together. Bridget tries to get reassurance from Eric, but he longs to tell her the truth. Phoebe reveals the condom wrapper to Taylor. Taylor is furious to learn that Thomas and Gaby had sex. Taylor calls Agent Dunn to report Thomas and Gaby.
